metadata.title: The Bridge Collection Antique Style Old World Greek Statue Head Cement Face Planter Pot
features: On-trend Stylish Planter Pot Cover: Decorative Grecian head cement planter designed in the style of an antique Alexander the Great bust statue that is sure to spark conversation at your house whether displayed indoors or outdoors, this cement planter is sure to turn heads!

Artistic Greco-inspired Design: This Greek bust is made of a solid cement stone composition along with a distressed finish to enhance the antique effect of this noble gentleman with flowing locks of curls. Perfect for those who enjoy Greek art pieces, vintage, or classic style.

High Quality: Made of durable cement for a lasting piece for generations this Grecian head planter measures 6"H x 4"W; Total available space for planting measures approximately 4"D x 3"W. This planter doesn't feature a drain hole.

Unique Gift: Bring this head planter to your house or give the perfect gift to someone you know who loves to garden, Greek art, or classically styled pieces for their home. Perfect for anniversaries, birthdays, housewarming and more!
Added Note: Planter does NOT feature a drain hole - use with pre-potted plants or add pebbles to ensure adequate oxygenation and optimal plant health.
description: This small cement planter is uniquely designed as a Greco-Roman era statue. The male statue head features a distressed finish to enhance the antique effect. Makes a great piece to display small plants, herbs, and succulents indoors or outdoors. Measures 6"H x 4"W with an approximate planting area measuring 4"H x 3"W. Does not feature a drain hole.
